uw.rfpk.mda
Class Server

java.lang.Object
  uw.rfpk.mda.Server

public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

This class makes calls to the server for the transactions required by the model design agent of the SPK.

server host name as a String object.

public java.lang.String getPort()

submitJob

public boolean submitJob(java.lang.String source,
                         java.lang.String jobAbstract,
                         ArchiveInfo modelInfo,
                         ArchiveInfo dataInfo,
                         java.lang.String jobMethodCode,
                         long jobParent,
                         boolean isWarmStart,
                         boolean isMailNotice)
Submit a SPK job to the database server.

Parameters:
source - Spk source XML document.
jobAbstract - short description of the job.
modelInfo - archive information of the model associated with the job.
dataInfo - archive information of the dataset associated with the job.
jobMethodCode - a String containing job method code.
jobParent - a long representing the id of the parent job.
isWarmStart - a boolean "true" for warm start, "false" for otherwise.
isMailNotice - a boolean "true" for sending end-job mail notice, "false" for otherwise.
Returns:
true if the job submission was successful, false if otherwise.

abortJob

public boolean abortJob(long jobId)
Send a message to the server to abort a job.

Parameters:
jobId - id number of the job.
Returns:
true if the job's state_code is set to "end" by this method, otherwise false.

setJobAbstract

public boolean setJobAbstract(long jobId,
                              java.lang.String jobAbstract)
Send a message to the server to set job abstract.

Parameters:
jobId - id number of the job.
jobAbstract - abstract field of the job to set.
Returns:
true if the job's abstract has been successfully updated, otherwise false.

setJobShareWith

public boolean setJobShareWith(long jobId,
                               java.lang.String shareWithName)
Send a message to the server to set job share_with.

Parameters:
jobId - id number of the job.
shareWithName - username of the user with whom the job is to share.
Returns:
true if the job's share_wide has been successfully set, otherwise false.

getUserJobs

public java.lang.String[][] getUserJobs(int maxNum,
                                        long leftOff,
                                        java.lang.String username,
                                        java.lang.String startID,
                                        java.lang.String startTime,
                                        java.lang.String keyWords,
                                        java.lang.String modelID,
                                        java.lang.String datasetID)
Get a sequence of jobs for a given user.

Parameters:
maxNum - maximum number of jobs to provide status for.
leftOff - least jobId previously returned (0 if first call in sequence).
username - job owner's username.
startID - starting jobID.
startTime - starting submission time.
keyWords - key words either in job abstract, in model name on in dataset name.
modelID - finding jobs that use this model.
datasetID - finding jobs that use thos dataset.
Returns:
a String[][] object that contains job id, start time(date format), state code(long format), end code(long format) and job abstract of the jobs. The first index of the array is the job sequence in reversed order. The second index designates the fields. null if failed.

getJobInfo

public java.util.Properties getJobInfo(long jobId)
Get job information including model name, model version dataset name dataset version.

Parameters:
jobId - id number of the job.
Returns:
a Properties object containing the job information including model name, model version dataset name dataset version. null if failed.

getJobArchive

public java.util.Properties getJobArchive(long jobId,
                                          java.lang.String type)
Get either model archive or dataset archive for the job.

Parameters:
jobId - id number of the job.
type - either "model" or "data" to specify the type.
Returns:
a Properties object containing the archive text, name and version.

getHistory

public java.lang.String[][] getHistory(long jobId)
Get job history.

Parameters:
jobId - id number of the job.
Returns:
a String[][] object containing the job history including event time, state code and host. null if failed.

getUserModels

public java.lang.String[][] getUserModels(int maxNum,
                                          long leftOff,
                                          java.lang.String username)
Get a sequence of models for a given user.

Parameters:
maxNum - maximum number of models to provide status for.
leftOff - least modelId previously returned (0 if first call in sequence).
username - model owner's username.
Returns:
a String[][] object that contains model id, model name, last revision time(date format), and model abstract of the models. The first index of the array is the model sequence in reversed order. The second index designates the fields. null if failed.

getUserDatasets

public java.lang.String[][] getUserDatasets(int maxNum,
                                            long leftOff,
                                            java.lang.String username)
Get a sequence of datasets for a given user.

Parameters:
maxNum - maximum number of datasets to provide status for.
leftOff - least datasetId previously returned (0 if first call in sequence).
username - dataset owner's username.
Returns:
a String[][] object that contains dataset id, dataset name, last revision time(date format), and dataset abstract of the datasets. The first index of the array is the dataset sequence in reversed order. The second index designates the fields. null if failed.

getVersions

public java.lang.String[][] getVersions(long id,
                                        java.lang.String type)
Get a sequence of versions for a given model or a given dataset.

Parameters:
id - the id number of the model or the dataset.
type - a String specifying model or dataset.
Returns:
a String[][] object that contains version number, author name, revision time(date format) and log message of the versions. The first index of the array is the version sequence in reversed order. The second index designates the fields. null if failed.

getLastVersion

public java.lang.String getLastVersion(long id,
                                       java.lang.String type)
Get the last revision version of a given model or a given dataset.

Parameters:
id - the id number of the model or the dataset.
type - a String specifying model or dataset.
Returns:
a String object that contains last revision version number. null if failed.

getArchive

public java.lang.String getArchive(java.lang.String version)
Get archive and log of a given version.

Parameters:
version - version number.
Returns:
a String object containing archive text of the version. null if failed.

diffFiles

public java.lang.String diffFiles(java.lang.String text1,
                                  java.lang.String text2)
Get archive and log of a given version.

Parameters:
text1 - a String object containing the first text to diff.
text2 - a String object containing the second text to diff.
Returns:
a String object containing the revision of the two texts in Unix format. null if failed.

Ends a session of web application at user's choice.
